PHRASE.LANG: Traje elemental de fuego para hombre
This guy literally has smoke and ash shooting out of his head. [#Legal]
De la fumée et des cendres jaillissent littéralement de la tête de ce type. [#Legal]
Diesem Kerl raucht im wahrsten Sinne des Wortes der Schädel. [#Legal]
Questo tizio fa letteralmente fuoco e fiamme. [#Legal]
A este le sale humo de la cabeza. Literalmente. [#Legal]
This guy literally has smoke and ash shooting out of his head. [#Legal]
